Package moteur

Class PlayerReel

  • java.lang.Object
    • moteur.Observable
      • moteur.Player
        • moteur.PlayerReel
  • public class PlayerReel
extends Player
    The class PlayerReel is a player, so it extends Player, thus, a PlayerReel will take all of the attributs and methodes of its super class.

    Plus, a PlayerReel is controlled and manipulated by a human, so he or she will be asked to make the choice, including the chooseOneFaceup() and choosesomesOffer().

    See Also:
    Player, PlayerVirtuel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void chooseOneFaceup()
      This methode waits for a player to make his/her choice. if it is his/her turn.
      void chooseSomeonesOffer()
      Only if it is the player's turn shall the player make the choice, so this methode will be controlled and called by GameController.

    • Method Detail

      • chooseOneFaceup

        public void chooseOneFaceup()
        This methode waits for a player to make his/her choice. if it is his/her turn. To choose a card to turn to face up, type in a number or react on the graphic interface.
        Specified by:
        chooseOneFaceup in class Player

      • chooseSomeonesOffer

        public void chooseSomeonesOffer()
                         throws InvalidNumberException
        Only if it is the player's turn shall the player make the choice, so this methode will be controlled and called by GameController.

        To choose a card, type in a number or react on the graphic interface.

        Specified by:
        chooseSomeonesOffer in class Player
        Throws:
        InvalidNumberException
